content.question: A formal culture region differs from other regions in that it

choices.label: has a focal point or node
is one that people believe exists
has a selected feature or internal uniformity
does not contain gradations such as core, domain, and sphere
applies only to linguistic and religion regions

content.answer: has a selected feature or internal uniformity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
